justification: Team B needs immediate, consistent production and values workhorse RBs; this offer asks for B’s best RB and WR while giving a QB downgrade (Ethan T4 vs B’s Sam Martinez T2) and a WR2. It ignores B’s thin RB depth and win-now urgency. The rationale mischaracterizes roles (“QB stability,” “possession WR”) and doesn’t create a stack or fit B’s preferences. Overall lopsided and unrealistic for B.
